Posts.EditableText: It would be extremely useful if you could allow Quest to read/write to txt or similar files. With this, you could allow crossing games with the stats printed in the file, or save stats for multiplayer games. This could allow you to reset QuestNet, etc. and keep everything. It should be easy to implement so I don't think it would be too much trouble to add.
